content:

Out of curiosity, I looked deeper and found that he even wrote another book called *"Why This Degree?"* (relatable, lol). And the craziest part? He never reveals his faceâ€”just his name. But I found out heâ€™s from **J section**.

I read his book, and honestly? **Itâ€™s really cute and inspiring.** ðŸ¥¹ This guy seems super motivated, hardworking, and just different.

But letâ€™s talk about that ex-girlfriendâ€¦ **Ananya**, girl, what did you do?? ðŸ«  How did you let go of someone like him? He literally sounds like a dream.

Anyone else heard about him? Or is it just me going down this rabbit hole? ðŸ‘€
